modName: Blades Armor redesigned in HD - Symbols Removed
summary: Edit of Blades Armour from Inosite\'s excellent original to remove the ying/yang & breastplate symbols
descriptionHtml:
Blades Armour retexture from Inosite / xwinchy\'s original. Removes the ying/yang & breastplate symbols.

Requires the original files from here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2122&navtag=file/images.php?id=2122&tab=3

Uploaded with permission.

For those who want a less shiny version, a quick & easy way is to delete the \"X_n.dds\" files from the mod, where X is the texture name:
E:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\blades

Standalone version:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15735

Update:
_n file for the armor has been updated using xwinchy\'s new version for those that want it.
author: AndyMg
